about.title: About PC Config Generator
about.subtitle: An AI-powered tool to simplify your PC building journey.
about.what_is_it_p1: PC Config Generator leverages the power of Google's Gemini AI to provide personalized computer build recommendations. Instead of spending hours researching component compatibility and performance benchmarks, you can get a balanced, well-researched parts list in seconds.
about.what_is_it_p2: Simply input your budget, intended use-case, target resolution, and any platform preference, and let the AI do the heavy lifting.
about.how_it_works_p1: When you click "Generate Build", the application sends your preferences to the Gemini API with a carefully crafted prompt. This prompt instructs the AI to act as a PC building expert and return a list of compatible components that fit your criteria.
about.how_it_works_p2: To ensure reliability, the AI is asked to format its response as a specific JSON object. This structured data is then parsed and displayed neatly in the component cards you see on the generator page.
about.disclaimer: Disclaimer: Prices and component availability are estimates provided by the AI and may not be 100% accurate. Always double-check prices and compatibility before purchasing.
